website_summaries.verdict: This keyboard has a great feel and feature set that you’d expect would cost a lot more.
pros: A sturdy keyboard at a low price
The look is great, and this option shines with features you’d expect in a much pricier model, including LED effects and a braided cord
cons: Some buyers dislike the key font, while others feel that the cord is too short

website_summaries.verdict: An excellent starter keyboard for new gamers learning the basics of key mapping.
pros: LED lights can be customized without needing to load drivers
Keys are easy to press and make the satisfying clicking sound of a mechanical keyboard
cons: No numeric keypad, which may affect some gaming
Shorter lifespan than other keyboards, with some failing after a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the keyboard for a day but I already love it. Never used a mechanical one before this as they were more money than I cared to pay for. After my latest keyboard died I decided to browse Amazon for a new one. This keyboard only costs a little more than a basic one so I thought I would give it a try. The back lit keys are pretty cool and I definitely like the sound and feel of them. The clicks are loud. Came with a tool to remove caps but I haven't tried it. I will definitely update after some prolonged use.
customer_reviews.author: JackBK201

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Limited lighting but Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a Razer replacement so much as it is a cheap alternative with great function as a keyboard and limited but sufficient (IMHO) lighting. The keys have some features and you can change the lighting a little and have some effects. this would make a great gift for a co-workers son - or for one child to gift another. I use this for my thrid machine. the packaging was HIGH end and felt nice. great gift idea for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Lumache

customer_reviews.title: Excellent colorful keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mechanical keyboard for the price.. nice LED color options and great feel while typing with the key sound (will be a little noisy which maybe disturbing mainly while playing racing games as you keep pressing the arrow keys but should get used to it and you will not notice if you are interested in the game & with medium volume at-least). Very compact yet perfectly sized keys which is very comfortable to type. Overall I really like this product and recommend this! ty!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Minimal flex in the board
customer_reviews.text: Very clicky. Good quality. Minimal flex in the board. Only thing I would change is add rubber to the feet and get rid of the key wobble. It’s not too noticeable on all of the keys but especially on the arrow keys they wobble a ton. Not a deal breaker at the price point however. Also I would add the option to just have the board 1 static color instead of different rows but I can’t complain since I knew what I was buying. Other than that it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Budget friendly clickety clackity board
customer_reviews.text: Budget friendly, high quality mechanical keyboard. I first purchased one of these about two years ago when I built a recent desktop and fell in love with the clickyness and responsiveness of it. I bought my second one when my gf decided to get into PC gaming and out of console gaming, and she immediately felt the difference over her basic $10 amazon keyboard. There’s just something different about the feel and audio satisfaction that will make you love it.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: This keyboard is a steal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard would definitely buy again, but it is super loud and that is exactly what I wanted they are blue switches and I own 23 keyboards myself (24 now after buying this one) and this one has the quality of a 60-90 dollar one the only downside is the rgb lights, you can’t change the colors but they have pretty cool modes for the rgb but that’s doesn’t bother me. This keyboard is a steal for the price it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest true mechanical with RGB as of this writing. Good feel, keys are a bit wider spaced than what Im used to, but have been using another 84 key for the last 10 years. Feel is good, the switches do click and it can get noisy. Nice braided cord. That being said, for the price you absolutely can not go wrong. I bought one for my kid and one for a workstation at work.
customer_reviews.author: girlgamer

customer_reviews.title: switches all started to slowly stop working
customer_reviews.text: I only used this keyboard for regular, daily use, for only about 4 months. The Cherry MX Blue mechanical switch replicas are not very much like the real thing at all but they are better than membrane keys. Unfortunately, the switches each started to slowly stop working. The first key I believe went was the shift key. The switch stopped working just like that. This is unacceptable and I will be contacting Amazon about this. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS TRASH!
customer_reviews.author: Yung VibeZZ

customer_reviews.title: Been using at work for almost a year
customer_reviews.text: Works so well! Everyone who sees it says the colors are so cool. I will say, it is a bit loud as mechanical keyboards can be but not too loud... I don't give people headaches ahaha I've asked
customer_reviews.author: Liz Hailand

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard With Real Switches
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is actually really good ive had this keyboard for about 2 years, and its still working as good as the day I got it. this keyboard is a true Blue Switch keyboard, I do think is better for gaming. The only problems I have with this keyboard is, that the LED's are not true RGB (But I dont care ) and The key switches are a bit noisy
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: bought 2 - they didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these back in 2017. Switches starting failing about 6 months later on both of them. From doubling entries to shift and ctrl no longer working. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Farclas

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard to get you up to speed.
customer_reviews.text: With this key board I can type 50 words a minute again. I use it at home attached to my laptop when I need to get down on some typing. I probably wouldn't use it in an office as the key taps may be to loud for others around. They keys are responsive and less missed keystrokes due to their layout. The colors are a plus.
customer_reviews.author: adrian

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed a keyboard for gaming, and this one was very cheap. Its a great keyboard, so I am very impressed because of how cheap the price is. This is the first mechanical keyboard I have had, and it feels great, especially compared to the membrane keyboards im used to.
customer_reviews.author: Nepgyaaaa!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard. The light functions are amazing and it is perfect for gaming or just to use it at the office. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Karen Perez Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfying click, good build quality
customer_reviews.text: All-around solid entry-level mechanical gaming keyboard. The chassis is aluminum, which is great. My only complaints are that the keys are a touch wobbly, and while you can program the order in which the keys light up, you can't change the color, ie, always rainbow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard for the price. Lots of lighting options and no missed key strokes. My only complaint it that it could be a little brighter. But Im sure thats due to USB's limited power output. Love the side lighting. Never had that before.
customer_reviews.author: M. P. M.

customer_reviews.title: It's different
customer_reviews.text: The keys are a bit hard to press, and the lighting is not too bright behind the keys. I like to variety of colors and patterns, but all I really want is white color that's on all the time. It was cheap enough and it works on my Mac.
customer_reviews.author: audd

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUDGET MECHANICAL KEYBOARD ON THE MARKET!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best budget mechanical keyboard on the internet never mind just amazon. If you are coming from a membrane keyboard or just looking to get a new mechanical keyboard, this thing will not disappoint. The blue switches are super clicky and make a very satisfying sound. The RGB LEDs look beautiful and light up the keyboard perfectly. And the build quality is on the level of the $100 plus keyboard, with a great weight to it and a metal face plate. This is all around the perfect keyboard for anyone looking to get into the mechanical scene no matter what you budget is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light show.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is legit. Stop looking and buy. Love all the fun functions for the lights, but in all reality I only use the one with them all on. The button click feel is second to none.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work better than my Razor Ornata at times. I primarily bought this for when I was travelling as I was not a fan of the keyboard on my surface tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Spilled coffee on it and it's still kicking No way to turn off all lights as far as I can tell Very clicky, a bit heavy, still good though
customer_reviews.author: HARLAN P.

customer_reviews.title: Next best thing to apple pie.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10-year-old son that plays a lot of games online. He loves it. It’s the next best thing to apple pie as he puts it.
customer_reviews.author: richard s.

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent keyboard and I can't believe the bargain price
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent keyboard and I can't believe the bargain price... This kind of keyboard brings back memories of when keyboards were made right. Great product, cool features and the lighting is very bright.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: I've been shopping around for a mechanical keyboard for a couple of weeks. My issue is that I'm not a gamer, but love the sound and feel of the mechanical keyboard. This arrived very quickly and I am enjoying it. It's inspired me to write again as I enjoy hearing the "clicky" sound. Good for those in a similar situation who don't want to spend $50.00 or more on an attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Excellent keyboard with a big bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is simply amazing. It's an absolute pleasure to type on this. Who says you need to spend 100 or more dollars on a good mechanical keyboard when you can get a no name brand like this one that is just as good but at a small fraction of the price?
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: This sure is a keyboard
customer_reviews.text: It is a mechanical keyboard as advertised. Has a variety of lights. Can't program custom color configurations, but it has several presets. Does not seem to be true RGB, instead has rows of each color. It works pretty well, and did not die when I spilled tea on it and rinsed it with water and let it dry.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne J.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, good feedback and works well for the games I play.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Buysalot

customer_reviews.title: A must purchase!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best mechanical keyboards out there and for a good price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W

customer_reviews.title: 1 small issue
customer_reviews.text: the only thing minor issue is that it is not perfectly level when the angle feet are down. But when you press the corner by the escape key there is some play but if you are typing it doesn't move. other than the issue its a great keyboard the i like the mechanical keys on this keyboard and the lighting effects.
customer_reviews.author: Sawyer Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Add to cart and checkout
customer_reviews.text: Alright so for under $30 you get a mechanical keyboard that’s very clicky and enjoyable! The colors are nice for the keys For the price you really can’t find anything better unless you go up to $60.
customer_reviews.author: john wick

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard for the money
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an inexpensive tenkeyless, this is a great choice. Had this keyboard for 6 months, and have been very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: It's simple to use and the smaller size is nice for
customer_reviews.text: Nicer than expected for a cheap mechanical keyboard. It's simple to use and the smaller size is nice for portability
customer_reviews.author: Ross K.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: all good, RGB and buttons are working, great to game on and type
customer_reviews.author: Tigran

customer_reviews.title: Really like it keys are loud and clicky tbh
customer_reviews.text: I like it honestly lol I’ve had it for a little over a week and I really do like it I think my favorite part is the rbg effect me especially how you can customize your own I would recommend, the keys are really clicky and I love it it’s soothing but if you don’t like loud keyboard find one with quiet switch’s or a membrane keyboard
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Cool keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard and the led lights look awesome. I like how there are modes to make the lights move and it does really feel like a mechanical keyboard as well! Good keyboard 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise fine. Also
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard works well except the "4" key has to be pressed very hard to work. Otherwise fine. Also, backlight can't be completely turned off it seems, just lowered in intensity.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Keyboard I am really satisfied with this one! Wish I had known about it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Pena

customer_reviews.title: Love it, got it a few months ago. Still working good. Takes heavy use.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Is heavy and stays put. Fits on my desk nice. Has good backlight settings for a gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the key board, the keys work fast and sound of typing built right in.
customer_reviews.author: tikiwood

customer_reviews.title: Great feeling and loud keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I really like the feel and sound of the keyboard. For the price you can’t find a better keyboard but be warned that if you are planning to buy this for a office the keys are extremely loud so consider O rings. My only complaint is the space feeling a little off compare to the other keys.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Pham

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome keyboard for the price. Adobe serious weight to this keyboard. Very substantial!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Droog

customer_reviews.title: Great budget keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is amazing for it's price! With the LED backlighting and the mechanical switches, this makes it a great buy when on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Jhaden gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a birthday gift for someone else
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandsons birthday next month. So haven’t used it yet
customer_reviews.author: Xreeferman

customer_reviews.title: Down key keeps popping off
customer_reviews.text: Works, and the lights ar nice. Good click and distance, but annoyingly the down key pops off every once in a while
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Poor design IMO
customer_reviews.text: Although backlit, the bottom row of keys are hard to see, even in a darkened room. Poor design IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Puran Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this was a cheaply priced but decent keyboard. Only reason its not 5 out of 5 is I'd like to see how long it functions and will edit review accordingly... stay tuned
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard for the money
customer_reviews.text: Decent keyboard ..keys are a tad smaller than normal .. But its good size its not super loud its a low quality mech keyboard to start with. But for the price its great great colors ..many settings ..
customer_reviews.author: Josh B

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend
customer_reviews.text: It’s insane for a $30 keyboard I expected a cheap one but had it for a year not a single problem would 100% recommend. I compared it to a $180 hyperx one and it worked better it is also insanely loud and clicky.
customer_reviews.author: Munir

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a solid click.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great price. Nice and clicky. Keyboard effects look fairly nice. Feels quality. Cons: media keys leave a bit to be desired, but that's my fault for not noticing a play/pause or skip button
customer_reviews.author: Jared Thistle

customer_reviews.title: great product for the buck and LOVE THE
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it.. xact to the T.. great product for the buck and LOVE THE RGB
customer_reviews.author: FLIP

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money, true mechanical for a low price
customer_reviews.author: Edison Arias

customer_reviews.title: Best keyboard on amazon
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard for the price to bad they don't sell it on amazon anymore 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great little keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Great little keyboard, very responsive and the lighting is cool. It is noisy but the clickness is has a solid feel. Great for gaming. I like it more then my $109.00 G710.....
customer_reviews.author: Richard Webster

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: TRUE MECHANICAL KEYBOARD! This is a great buy for the price. Nice click noise, and no complaints as of it. Works great, just plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hall

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly keys
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is how wobbly the key are. other than that I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: alamansoori_qtr1@hotmail.com
customer_reviews.text: Thank you ... that's what I wish ... the best product
customer_reviews.author: SALEM

customer_reviews.title: Its great for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think it was durable but it dropped many times and perfect
customer_reviews.author: JCCanales

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing. Plugged into PS4 for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Allen

customer_reviews.title: The keyboard feels really good. However
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard feels really good. However, the space bar rattles very loudly and the keys are way louder than they need to be.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Marinucci

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: amazing mechanical keyboard. just as good as the brand names trust me!
customer_reviews.author: Omar Cavazos

product_meta.title: Hcman Mechanical Keyboard Blue Switches,21 LED Backlit Modes Gaming Keyboard,Metal Plate 100% Anti-ghosting for Computer PC & Mac Gamers (Silver)
feature_bullets: ANTI-GHOSTING MECHANICAL KEYBOARDS: Compatible Games And Office Mechanical Touch.This mechanical gaming keyboard adopts anti-ghosting technology that each key is controlled by independent mechanical switch,let you enjoy high-grade games with fast response,this gaming keyboard great for gamers,typist,programmer,writer etc

21 LED BACKLIT MODES KEYBOARD: This colors led usb wired gaming keyboard has 21 different lighting modes,lighting like rgb gaming keyboard.Customized adjustment for intensity and lighting for special game demand,press FN+END to start and save recording

MECHANICAL BLUE SWITCHES: Giving you a clicky and tactile feedback,sounded like cherry mx gaming keyboard,This gaming keyboard provides great tactile feel,sensitive and responsive.50 million times keystroke test, 60+/-15 grams keystroke force and 4.0+/-0.2mm keystroke travel,perfect for professional PC gamers and typists

ERGONOMIC MECHANICAL GAMING KEYBOARD: Compact dimensions size down the entire gaming keyboard and navigate it easily,this gaming keyboard can also save the space on your desk.Ergonomic arc and slope,when you use this wired usb gaming keyboard,your hands are not easily get fatigue

DURABILITY AND COMPATIBILITY: Aviation aluminum alloy pannel,slip design.Floting Keycaps with unique bicolor mold injection for durable.Made of top-grade ABS and metal material with matte-finish texture,it is sturdy and robust and splash proof design.The gaming keyboard support computer system including Windows 10,Windows 8,Windows 7,Macintosh Mac OS X,Windows XP,Windows VISTA,etc

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars168 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
